component.name: Agregore Browser
component.summary: A minimal browser for the distributed web

description.p: Features: - Browse the existing (HTTP) web like usual. - Browse the Distributed Web on Hypercore, BitTorrent, and IPFS. - Browse alternate web protocols like Gemini - Tracking free with a built in Ad blocker - Render Markdown documents natively - Archive and save web pages for offline use via ArchiveWeb.page - Customizable color scheme which gets applied to all pages - New web APIs for creating p2p sites and apps - Built in large language model APIs using free to use local models
